name: Mojito
description: Fresh mint, lime juice, white rum, and soda water. A refreshing classic.

name: Old Fashioned
description: Bourbon, sugar, bitters, and a twist of citrus. A timeless favorite.

name: Pina Colada
description: Coconut cream, pineapple juice, and white rum. Pure tropical bliss.

name: Daiquiri
description: White rum, lime juice, and simple syrup. Light and perfectly balanced.

name: Negroni
description: Equal parts gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth. Bold and complex.

name: Espresso Martini
description: Vodka, Kahlua, and fresh espresso. The perfect pick-me-up.

name: Mai Tai
description: Rum, lime juice, orange liqueur, and almond syrup. Exotic and delicious.

name: Cosmopolitan
description: Vodka, cranberry juice, lime, and triple sec. Elegant and tart.

name: Manhattan
description: Rye whiskey, sweet vermouth, and bitters. Smooth and sophisticated.
